description: Following Jimmy Garoppolo's failed tenure in Las Vegas and the Los Angeles Rams stating they needed a backup quarterback amid Stetson Bennett's absence, the Rams have reportedly signed Garoppolo to a one-year deal.

author: Edward-Isaac Dovere, Steve Contorno, Annie Grayer
title: Why does Biden keep mentioning January 6? Because Trump won’t stop talking about it | CNN Politics
description: The rallies start with a recording of January 6 prisoners singing the national anthem. Campaign staff hand out pre-made “Too Big to Rig” signs to supporters. When the candidate takes the stage, he calls the rioters “people who love our country” and “hostages …
